title: ​High Potential Opportunities

title: Devolved Administration(s)

​A group of 14 countries in Eastern Europe and Central Asia.
The 14 countries in EECAN are&%2358; Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, Mongolia, Russia, Tajikistan, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Ukraine and Uzbekistan.

title: In Year Awards
explanation:
​What is a cash In-Year Award (IYA)?

The cash bonus reward scheme is part of DIT’s commitment to recognise individual or team contributions, and you can nominate colleagues for a cash award up to £800. For this round, nominations will be scored Low, Medium and High, with amounts initially set at £300, £600 and £800. IYA rounds are conducted and awarded quarterly in DDaT, and is separate from the year-round Voucher scheme.
text_explanation:
​What is a cash In-Year Award (IYA)?The cash bonus reward scheme is part of DIT’s commitment to
recognise individual or team contributions, and you can nominate colleagues for
a cash award up to £800. For this round, nominations will be scored Low, Medium
and High, with amounts initially set at £300, £600 and £800. IYA rounds are
conducted and awarded quarterly in DDaT, and is separate from the year-round
Voucher scheme.

title: Information Risk Assurance Process
explanation:
You need to follow the Information and Risk Assurance Process (IRAP) if you are&%2358; collecting, processing or storing data, sharing data, buying technology,
building new systems or subscribing to data services.
text_explanation:
You need to follow the Information and Risk Assurance Process (IRAP) if you are&%2358; collecting, processing or storing data, sharing data, buying technology,
building new systems or subscribing to data services.

title: International Trade Adviser
explanation: UK based Third party suppliers, working in nine regional teams managed by Delivery Partners. ITA’s work with companies to support them on their exporting journey. They might also support investment opportunities or High Potential Opportunities (a form of targeted investment) in their region. Mostly focus on export.
text_explanation:
UK based Third party suppliers, working in

title: Investment Support Team
explanation: ​The Investment team is (currently) a 3rd party team from EY, managed by DIT. They are contracted to source, nurture and develop leads that will then turn into successful investment projects into the UK. They get enquiries from LinkedIn, Great.gov.uk and through Post.

text_explanation: ​A tool that is used to process and assess logs from multiple systems to identify patterns and early signs of security related events.&%23160;

title: Security Transformation Board
explanation: Board chaired by DG COO with membership across DIT to ensure improvement in our security capability
text_explanation: Board chaired by DG COO with membership across DIT to ensure improvement in our security capability

title: Single Sign-On
explanation:
It ​is an authentication method that enables users to securely authenticate with multiple applications and websites by using just one set of credentials.
In essence, it allows you to log in once and use multiple systems and tools without the need to enter your details multiple times.
text_explanation: It ​is an authentication method that enables users to securely authenticate with multiple applications and websites by using just one set of credentials. In essence, it allows you to log in once and use multiple systems and tools without the need to enter your details multiple times.

title: Single Trade Window
explanation: A cross government programme to align and integrate trade-related systems into a simple front-end for businesses
text_explanation: A cross government programme to align and integrate trade-related systems into a simple front-end for businesses

title: Site Reliability Engineering
explanation: It ​is a set of principles and practices that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.
text_explanation: It ​is a set of principles and practices that incorporates aspects of software engineering and applies them to infrastructure and operations problems. The main goals are to create scalable and highly reliable software systems.

title: Strategic Relationship Managers
explanation:
​

This team are responsible for promoting opportunities and removing barriers to growth for significant UK based companies by ensuring a collaborative and joined up approach to client engagement across Whitehall, regions and our global network.

​This team are responsible for promoting opportunities and removing
barriers to growth for significant UK based companies by ensuring a collaborative
and joined up approach to client engagement across Whitehall, regions and our
global network.

explanation: Investigates whether new trade remedies are needed to prevent injury to UK industries caused by unfair trading practices and unforeseen surges in imports. Will become the TRA once Trade Bill receives Royal Assent.
text_explanation: Investigates whether new trade remedies are needed to prevent injury to UK industries caused by unfair trading practices and unforeseen surges in imports. Will become the TRA once Trade Bill receives Royal Assent.
